thread.title: Weinstein charged with rape, free on $1 Mln bail

title: Weinstein charged with rape, free on $1 Mln bail
text:
Weinstein charged with rape, free on $1 Mln bail 7:46pm BST - 01:28
The lawyer for disgraced film producer Harvey Weinstein says his client intends to plead not guilty to charges of rape and sex abuse, after being taken to a New York courthouse in handcuffs where he posted a $1 million bail. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
The lawyer for disgraced film producer Harvey Weinstein says his client intends to plead not guilty to charges of rape and sex abuse, after being taken to a New York courthouse in handcuffs where he posted a $1 million bail.
